item.title: Speed up your code by using a cache in Python
item.description: If the first concern of a developer is to be sure that the code they write works well, the second one is to make sure that it run fast. This is expecially true when you’re dealing with web applications, where the scalability of your application is a crucial topic. For this reason, one of the most important tool we can use to improve the speed of our code is the use of a cache system.
